body_html:
Please checkout this RDMA enhancement of TensorFlow mentioned by @junshi15. You could use it independent of TensorFlowOnSpark.

It is designed to work in a cloud setting, where a set of nodes are dynamically allocated.
That's why we avoid MPI option.

Please checkout this [RDMA enhancement ](https://github.com/yahoo/tensorflow/blob/yahoo/tensorflow/core/distributed_runtime/rdma/rdma_readme.md)of TensorFlow mentioned by @junshi15. You could use it independent of TensorFlowOnSpark. 

It is designed to work in a cloud setting, where a set of nodes are dynamically allocated. 
That's why we avoid MPI option.
